message.body: Good, have you called hung gar yet? Also, is ther anh way you can get some buckwheat flour on your way homec
All the shops that sell that will be closed by the time I leave the airport. Wednesday inshallah. I will call the hung gar.
He said it will still be $150 per month. Right now we can't afford it. Maybe in a few months. Sorry about that.
I will start saving for barbell...pray for money!!!!!!::-)
